title: Banana coconut loaf cake
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '200g sugar', '110g butter, melted', '225g mashed bananas', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '200g plain flour', '8 tablespoons desiccated coconut', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarb of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '60g chopped walnuts', '125g glace cherries, chopped']
